name: abrasiveness
content:
abrasiveness noun [U]
(rude behaviour)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a rude and unfriendly way of talking or behaving: She is disliked by many of her staff because of her abrasiveness. His abrasiveness intimidates many people.
More examplesFewer examplesHe is candid to the point of abrasiveness.She never displayed the big ego or abrasiveness that others have shown. Some people are put off by his abrasiveness.
